titleStmt.title: Hagiastrologia, or, The most sacred and divine science of astrology 1. Asserted in three propositions, shewing the excellency and great benefit thereof, where it is rightly understood and religiously observed : 2. vindicated, against the calumnies of the Reverend Dr. More in his Explanation of the grand mystery of godliness : 3. Excused, concerning pacts with evil spirits, as not guilty, in humble considerations upon the pious and learned discourse upon that subject, by the Right Reverend Father in God, Joseph sometimes Lord Bishop of Norwich / by J.B., B.D. ...
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Butler)

titleStmt.title: Hagiastrologia, or, The most sacred and divine science of astrology 1. Asserted in three propositions, shewing the excellency and great benefit thereof, where it is rightly understood and religiously observed : 2. vindicated, against the calumnies of the Reverend Dr. More in his Explanation of the grand mystery of godliness : 3. Excused, concerning pacts with evil spirits, as not guilty, in humble considerations upon the pious and learned discourse upon that subject, by the Right Reverend Father in God, Joseph sometimes Lord Bishop of Norwich / by J.B., B.D. ...
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Butler)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and are to be sold by William Bromwich ...,

notesStmt.note: Part 1 has t.p.: Hagiastrologia, or, Astrology a sacred science. Part 2 has t.p.: Astrologia, or, The most sacred and divine science of astrology vindicated ... Part 3 has caption title: An humble consideration by way of comment upon the pious and learned discourse of ... Joseph late Lord Bishop of Norwich ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
